lead_paragraph: Housing prices in Barbados are slowly returning to 2008 levels, brokers say, and new luxury properties are coming to market.
snippet: Housing prices in Barbados are slowly returning to 2008 levels, brokers say, and new luxury properties are coming to market.
abstract: International House Hunting column; three-bedroom beachfront house in Fitts Village on west coast of Barbados is listed at $3.5 million; information about market and tips for buying in Barbados highlighted.
